ingredients.item: 400g pack Waitrose Cooks’ Ingredients soffritto mix
300g Waitrose lean minced free range British pork
395g can essential Waitrose mixed beans in spicy tomato sauce
1-2 tbsp Waitrose Cooks' Ingredients chipotle paste
½ essential Waitrose Iceberg lettuce, finely shredded

instructions.step: Spray a large pan with oil and fry the soffritto mix for 5 minutes until softened. Add the pork and cumin seeds, and cook for 5 minutes.  Stir in the beans and chipotle paste. Cover and simmer gently for 15 minutes until the pork is cooked through.  Fill the taco shells with shredded lettuce, then spoon in the pork and bean mixture. Top with a little yogurt and a few coriander leaves, and serve immediately.
